header.label: Our Story
header.subtitle: More than a place to stay an experience built on intention, care, and a genuine commitment to doing hospitality well.

story.title: Why We Created
paragraphs: Exquisitebnb started with a simple observation: most short-term rentals fall short of what thoughtful travelers actually need. A clean room and a key code aren't enough. You deserve a space that feels considered somewhere you can settle in, work comfortably, and genuinely rest.
We've stayed in dozens of rentals ourselves some forgettable, some uncomfortable, and a rare few that made us think, 'This is how it should always be.' Those stays became our standard.

Each property we host is designed with intention. We care about the details that matter to you and the quality of the linens, the reliability of the Wi-Fi, the cleanliness you shouldn't have to think twice about. Great hospitality isn't about impressing you. It's about making your stay feel effortless.

values.title: Intentional Design
values.description: Every space is furnished and arranged with purpose Ã¢ÂÂ creating an atmosphere that's calm, functional, and genuinely pleasant to be in.

values.title: Consistent Standards
values.description: Cleanliness isn't a bonus Ã¢ÂÂ it's the baseline. Every surface, every linen, every detail is held to the same standard, every time.

values.title: Personal Hosting
values.description: Behind every stay is a real host who's responsive, attentive, and invested in making sure you have what you need.

values.title: Your Comfort Comes First
values.description: From practical amenities to seamless check-in, every decision is made with your experience in mind.

closing.title: A Thoughtful Stay,
closing.text: When you book with Exquisitebnb, you're choosing a host who takes this seriously. Personal, reliable, and consistently well-managed. We look forward to welcoming you.

header.label: Our Spaces
header.title: Properties Worth Staying In

properties.bookingNote: All bookings are handled securely through trusted platforms

items.name: The Gilded Loft
items.description: A well-designed downtown space with natural light, comfortable furnishings, and a layout that works for both focused work and easy downtime. Ideal for couples, small families, or professionals on longer assignments.
items.fullDescription: The Gilded Loft is a downtown retreat designed for guests who value both comfort and function. Large windows bring in natural light throughout the day, while thoughtful furnishings and a fully equipped kitchen make it easy to settle into a routine. Whether you're here for a week or a month, this space is designed to feel like yours.

reviews.text: Clean, quiet, and perfectly set up for working remotely. Everything we needed was there.
reviews.author: Sarah M.

reviews.text: The natural light and kitchen made all the difference. Felt like home within a day.
reviews.author: James K.

items.name: Velvet Haven
items.description: A calm, well-appointed space designed for rest and focus. Warm lighting, quality textiles, and a quiet setting make it well suited for solo professionals or couples seeking a peaceful stay.
items.fullDescription: Velvet Haven is a one-bedroom retreat in Midtown, designed around comfort and calm. Soft textures, warm lighting, and a considered layout make it a space where you can genuinely unwind. It's quiet, well-maintained, and close to everything you need Ã¢ÂÂ without the noise.

reviews.text: Exactly what I needed Ã¢ÂÂ quiet, clean, and comfortable. The kind of place where you can actually rest.
reviews.author: Elena R.

items.name: The Urban Retreat
items.description: A spacious, well-organized home with room for the whole family. A full kitchen, comfortable living areas, and a calm residential setting make it ideal for longer stays and working remotely.
items.fullDescription: The Urban Retreat is built for families and groups who need real space. Three bedrooms, a full kitchen, and generous living areas give everyone room to spread out. The neighborhood is quiet and residential, and the home is designed to make extended stays feel easy and comfortable.

reviews.text: Our family stayed for two weeks and it felt like home. The kitchen was fully stocked and the space was spotless.
reviews.author: Michael T.

items.name: The Serene Suite
items.description: A calm, spa-inspired space near the waterfront. Designed for guests who value rest and quiet Ã¢ÂÂ with quality amenities, soft lighting, and a peaceful atmosphere throughout.
items.fullDescription: The Serene Suite is a waterfront retreat designed for genuine relaxation. Calming tones, quality amenities, and thoughtful lighting create a space that feels restful from the moment you arrive. Whether you're unwinding after a long week of travel or settling in for an extended stay, this is a space that lets you breathe.

reviews.text: Spotless, quiet, and beautifully maintained. The kind of stay where you feel taken care of.
reviews.author: Anna L.

header.label: Common Questions
header.title: Things You Might Want to Know
header.subtitle: Straightforward answers to the questions we hear most often. If something's not covered here, we're happy to help Ã¢ÂÂ just reach out.

items.question: How do I book a stay?
items.answer: Browse our properties, choose the one that fits your needs, and book directly through one of our trusted partner platforms Ã¢ÂÂ Airbnb, VRBO, or Booking.com. Each platform handles reservations, payments, and guest protection, so you can book with confidence.

items.question: Which platforms do you use for bookings?
items.answer: We list our properties on Airbnb, VRBO, and Booking.com. Availability and pricing are synced across all three, so you're welcome to use whichever platform you're most comfortable with.

items.question: How is cleanliness handled?
items.answer: Every property is professionally cleaned between stays using consistent, hotel-level protocols. Fresh linens, sanitized surfaces, and restocked essentials are standard Ã¢ÂÂ not optional. You'll arrive to a space that's ready for you.

items.question: What is the check-in and check-out process?
items.answer: We use self check-in with clear instructions sent before your arrival. Most properties have smart locks or secure lockboxes, so you can arrive on your own schedule. Check-in is typically at 3 PM and check-out at 11 AM, though we're happy to accommodate flexibility when possible.

items.question: What amenities are included?
items.answer: All properties include reliable high-speed Wi-Fi, quality linens and towels, a fully equipped kitchen, toiletries, coffee and tea, and streaming services. Many also include parking, air conditioning, a washer/dryer, and a dedicated workspace. Specific details are listed on each property page.

items.question: What is the cancellation policy?
items.answer: Cancellation terms are set by each booking platform and may vary by property. Generally, we offer fair and flexible terms. Full details are always visible before you confirm your booking.

items.question: How can I reach the host during my stay?
items.answer: You can message us through the booking platform at any time. We aim to respond within 30 minutes during the day. For anything urgent, we provide a direct phone number after booking. We're here to make sure your stay goes smoothly.

items.question: Are pets allowed?
items.answer: Pet policies vary by property. Some spaces welcome pets with a small fee, while others remain pet-free for guests with sensitivities. Check the specific property listing for details, or reach out if you have questions.

items.question: Is parking available?
items.answer: Many of our properties include free parking Ã¢ÂÂ this is noted on each listing. For those without dedicated parking, we provide clear information about nearby street parking and garage options.

items.question: Can I host events or gatherings?
items.answer: Our properties are designed for comfortable living, not events. Small, quiet gatherings may be possible with prior approval, but parties are not permitted. This helps us maintain the quality of the space and respect for the neighborhood.

whyPartner.text: Exquisitebnb is built on a simple idea: quality stays require intention. Our partnerships are selective because the standard we set for guests depends on the standard we share with our partners.

items: Property owners with well-maintained homes seeking thoughtful positioning

noteFull.label: A Gentle Note
noteFull.title: This May Not Be the Right Fit If...
noteFull.text1: Our approach is intentional, which means it's not for everyone. If your primary goal is maximizing nightly rates above all else, or if guest experience feels secondary to revenue, we may not be the right match.
noteFull.text2: We work best with partners who see their property as a space that deserves care Ã¢ÂÂ not just an asset to optimize.

steps.title: A Conversation

steps.title: Alignment
